// 投资页面 import { useState , useEffect } from "react" import { Collapse , Button , Layout } from 'antd'; import axios from "axios" import "./investment.css" import { getInvestmentList, getInvestmentDetail } from "./../../api/investment" const { Header } = Layout; const { Panel } = Collapse; function callback(key) { console.log(key); } const text = (
reward pool地址：
策略地址：
代币地址
金库地址
金库owner
策略opwner
) const Investment = () => { const [ investmentList, setInvestmentList] = useState([]) const [ nvestmentDetail , setNvestmentDetail ] = useState() useEffect( ()=>{ axios.get("https://api.converter.finance/getTokenList").then(res=>{ console.log(res) }) } ) return(
POOL INFO
一键EARN 一键HARVEST
名称 收益代币
MDX-USTD con
} key="1">

{text}

) } export default Investment
